price: prema Allahovu zakonu koji je vrijedio za one koji su bili i nestali! A ti nećeš u Allahovom zakonu izmjene naći.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi fī alladhīna khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
